news_header: Konecranes' operating profit rose to EUR 146 million, with net sales up 5.5% to EUR 1,213 million.
news_text: Konecranes, a lifting equipment manufacturer, reported an increase in operating profit from EUR 122 million to EUR 146 million from October to December. Net sales rose by 5.5% to EUR 1,213 million, and the company received 25% more orders than the previous year, totaling EUR 1,166.5 million compared to EUR 926 million last year. The company is optimistic about the prospects for the beginning of the year.
